abstract: “We have many shareholders, now including Mr. Icahn, and we’re always open to their perspective on how to build on our success,” a Netflix spokesman says in an e-mail.
snippet: “We have many shareholders, now including Mr. Icahn, and we’re always open to their perspective on how to build on our success,” a Netflix spokesman says in an e-mail.
lead_paragraph: Netflix isn’t giving Carl C. Icahn the cold shoulder — at least not yet.

headline.main: Netflix Says It Is Open to Icahn’s ‘Perspective’
